raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


In one aspect the present invention provides compounds having a pKi comprised between 5.4 and 6.5 as derived from the assay method set out below.
In another aspect the present invention provides compounds having a pKi comprised between 6.5 and 7.0 as derived from such an assay.
In a further aspect the present invention provides compounds having a pKi greater than 7.0 as derived from such an assay.
The assay described above is believed to have an effective limit of detection of a pKi in the region of 5.0-5.5.
Using this assay, all of the exemplified compounds gave a pKi≧5.0.
